abilities: Boss Damage +10% / Damage to Abnormal Status +8%

attackStats.name: Attack Speed
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Stage 4}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/mp-boost.png} tip={MP Boost (1st Job)} val={+1}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/agile-magic.png} tip={Agile Magic (2nd Job)} val={+2}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/agile-magic.png} tip={Agile Magic (2nd Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={/class-icons/common/high-wisdom.png} tip={High Wisdom (2nd Job)} val={+40}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/unreliable-memory.png} tip={Unreliable Magic - Passive (5th Job)} val={+30}> <bg type={def} sub={opt} src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior (4th Job)} val={+15% to assigned AP} subSrc={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} subTip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} subVal={extra +400%}>

attackStats.name: Magic Attack
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} val={+4%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/meditation.png} tip={Meditation (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/spell-mastery.png} tip={Spell Mastery (2nd Job)} val={+10}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/buff-mastery.png} tip={Buff Mastery (4th Job)} val={+30}>

attackStats.name: Crit Rate
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +5%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/spell-mastery.png} tip={Spell Mastery (2nd Job)} val={+5%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/arcane-overdrive.png} tip={Arcane Overdrive (3rd Job)} val={+30%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/mp-boost.png} tip={MP Boost (1st Job)} val={+5% if Wand is equipped}>

attackStats.name: Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/element-amplification.png} tip={Element Amplification (3rd Job)} val={+50%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/arcane-aim.png} tip={Arcane Aim (4th Job)} val={+8% per successful attack} val={(Max. +40%)}> <bg type={debuff} src={/class-icons/link-skills/empirical-knowledge.png} tip={Empirical Knowledge (Link Skill)} val={+3% per stack} val={(Max. +9%)}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/epic-adventure.png} tip={Epic Adventure (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.name: Final Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/elemental-decrease.png} tip={Elemental Decrease (3rd Job)} val={+40%}> × <bg type={def} sub={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/fervent-drain.png} tip={Fervent Drain (4th Job)} val={+5% per active DoT} val={(Max. +25%)} subSrc={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/infernal-venom.png} subTip={Infernal Venom (6th Job)} subVal={when used, up to 50% instead}> × <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/infinity.png} tip={Infinity (4th Job)} val={up to +115%}> × <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/burning-magic.png} tip={Burning Magic (3rd Job)} val={+13% to enemies with:} val={DoT, stun, freeze, darkness, paralysis}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/mana-overload.png} tip={Mana Overload (5th Job)} val={+8% while toggled}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/arcane-aim.png} tip={Arcane Aim (4th Job)} val={+20%}> × <bg type={debuff} src={/class-icons/link-skills/empirical-knowledge.png} tip={Empirical Knowledge (Link Skill)} val={+3% per stack} val={(Max. +9%)}>

buffInfo.toggles: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/magic-guard.png} tip={Magic Guard (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/ignite.png} tip={Ignite (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/teleport-mastery.png} tip={Teleport Mastery (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/teleport-boost.png} tip={Teleport Boost (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/inferno-aura.png} tip={Inferno Aura (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/mana-overload.png} tip={Mana Overload (5th Job)} dur={[30s cd]}>
buffInfo.summons: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/creeping-toxin.png} tip={Creeping Toxin (3rd Job)} dur={[60s]}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/ifrit.png} tip={Ifrit (4th Job)} dur={[260s]}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/elemental-fury.png} tip={Elemental Fury (5th Job)} dur={[3-6s based on Fervent Drain stacks](60s cd)}>
buffInfo.buffCd: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/elemental-adaptation.png} tip={Elemental Adaptation (3rd Job)} dur={[10 Critical Abnormal Statuses](240s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/infinity.png} tip={Infinity (4th Job)} dur={[40s](180s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/epic-adventure.png} tip={Epic Adventure (Hyper Skill)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} dur={[2400s](300s cd)}>
buffInfo.iFrame: <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/ethereal-form.png} tip={Ethereal Form (5th Job)} dur={[3s](60s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/infernal-venom.png} tip={Infernal Venom (6th Job)} dur={[360s cd]}>

linkSkill.name: Empirical Knowledge
linkSkill.shortDesc: When attacking, has a 31% chance to identify the weakness of the enemy with the highest Max HP among those struck, granting you the following bonuses against them:\nDamage per Stack: +5%, Enemy DEF Ignored per Stack: +5%\nEffect Duration: 10 sec, Stacks up to 3 times
linkSkill.desc: Successful attacks have a chance to debuff against the enemy with the highest Max HP
details: [Debuff]: Increases %Damage and %Ignore DEF against this enemy (stacks up to 3 times)
Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Magician to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the town Lith Harbor where Sugar has a quest called 'The Adventure Begins'. Accept the quest and choose the option 'Magician' when prompted

Continue with the story until Lv. 30 as a Magician and talk to Grendel the Really Old to accept a quest called 'The 3 Arcane Paths'. Complete the quest by choosing the option Wizard (Fire, Poison) and you will be on the path to a Arch Mage (Fire, Poison). Wizard (Fire, Poison) is the 2nd job of Arch Mage (Fire, Poison)

build: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/mana-wave.png} tip={Mana Wave}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/teleport.png} tip={Teleport}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/magic-guard.png} tip={Magic Guard}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/mp-boost.png} tip={MP Boost}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/magic-armor.png} tip={Magic Armor}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/energy-bolt.png} tip={Energy Bolt}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/spell-mastery.png} tip={Spell Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/high-wisdom.png} tip={High Wisdom}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/agile-magic.png} tip={Agile Magic}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/ignite.png} tip={Ignite}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/mp-eater.png} tip={MP Eater}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/meditation.png} tip={Meditation}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/flame-orb.png} tip={Flame Orb}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/poison-breath.png} tip={Poison Breath}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/teleport-boost.png} tip={Teleport Boost}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/burning-magic.png} tip={Burning Magic}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/element-amplification.png} tip={Element Amplification}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/arcane-overdrive.png} tip={Arcane Overdrive}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/elemental-decrease.png} tip={Elemental Decrease}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/teleport-mastery.png} tip={Teleport Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/creeping-toxin.png} tip={Creeping Toxin}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/explosion.png} tip={Explosion}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/poison-mist.png} tip={Poison Mist}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/elemental-adaptation.png} tip={Elemental Adaptation (Fire, Poison)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/buff-mastery.png} tip={Buff Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/flame-sweep.png} tip={Flame Sweep}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/ifrit.png} tip={Ifrit}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/arcane-aim.png} tip={Arcane Aim}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/infinity.png} tip={Infinity}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/meteor-shower.png} tip={Meteor Shower}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/mist-eruption.png} tip={Mist Eruption}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/flame-haze.png} tip={Flame Haze}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/flame-sweep-reinforce.png} tip={Flame Sweep - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/flame-sweep-extra-strike.png} tip={Flame Sweep - Extra Strike}> Flame Sweep - Reinforce and Extra Strike_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/mist-eruption-reinforce.png} tip={Mist Eruption - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/mist-eruption-guardbreaker.png} tip={Mist Eruption - Guardbreaker}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/mist-eruption-cooldown-cutter.png} tip={Mist Eruption - Cooldown Cutter}> Mist Eruption - Reinforce, Guardbreaker, and Cooldown Cutter_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/flame-sweep.png} tip={Flame Sweep (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/ignite.png} tip={Ignite (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/teleport-mastery.png} tip={Teleport Mastery/Creeping Toxin (3rd Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/flame-haze.png} tip={Flame Haze (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/mist-eruption.png} tip={Mist Eruption (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/meteor-shower.png} tip={Meteor Shower (4th Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/megiddo-flame.png} tip={Megiddo Flame (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/ifrit.png} tip={Ifrit (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/inferno-aura.png} tip={Inferno Aura (Hyper Skill)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
6 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/flame-orb.png} tip={Flame Orb (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/poison-breath.png} tip={Poison Breath (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/ignite.png} tip={Ignite (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/explosion.png} tip={Explosion (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/poison-mist.png} tip={Poison Mist (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/teleport-mastery.png} tip={Teleport Mastery/Creeping Toxin (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/flame-haze.png} tip={Flame Haze (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/mist-eruption.png} tip={Mist Eruption (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/ifrit.png} tip={Ifrit (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/flame-sweep.png} tip={Flame Sweep (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/meteor-shower.png} tip={Meteor Shower (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/inferno-aura.png} tip={Inferno Aura (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/megiddo-flame.png} tip={Megiddo Flame (Hyper Skill)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to bel and the members of the Explorer Mage Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build

extraContent.title: DoT Debuffs
content: Stacking DoT debuffs will increase the %Final Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/mist-eruption.png} tip={Mist Eruption (4th Job)}> Mist Eruption against an enemy. Below is a list of skills that apply DoT effects:

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/poison-breath.png} tip={Poison Breath (2nd Job)}> Poison Breath (2nd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/poison-mist.png} tip={Poison Mist (3rd Job)}> Poison Mist (3rd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/creeping-toxin.png} tip={Creeping Toxin (3rd Job)}> Creeping Toxin (3rd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/teleport-mastery.png} tip={Teleport Mastery (3rd Job)}> Teleport Mastery (3rd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/flame-sweep.png} tip={Flame Sweep (4th Job)}> Flame Sweep (4th Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/flame-haze.png} tip={Flame Haze (4th Job)}> Flame Haze (4th Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/ifrit.png} tip={Ifrit (4th Job)}> Ifrit (4th Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/inferno-aura.png} tip={Inferno Aura (Hyper Skill)}> Inferno Aura (Hyper Skill)_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/megiddo-flame.png} tip={Megiddo Flame (Hyper Skill)}> Megiddo Flame (Hyper Skill)_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/dot-punisher.png} tip={DoT Punisher (5th Job)}> DoT Punisher (5th Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/poison-nova.png} tip={Poison Nova (5th Job)}> Poison Nova (5th Job)_>

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/77/An_Arrangement_from_the_Goddess%2E} title={"An Arrangement from the Goddess"}>

primary.name: Energy Bolt
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Damage: 78%, Number of Attacks: 4 Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Casts an explosive orb forward

primary.name: Magic Guard
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 13, Damage Displaced: 85% of your MP, Duration: While the skill is activated
primary.desc: When toggled, a portion of your damage taken will be redirected towards your MP
details: Excludes attacks that deal %Max HP damage
Will not work if you have 0 MP

primary.name: Teleport
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Teleport to the left and right with 190, and up and down with 295\n[Passive Effects: Speed: +22, Max Speed: +20]
primary.desc: Teleports you in the direction you are moving in with your Arrow Keys
details: Can be used in the air and on ladders

primary.name: Mana Wave
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10. Allows you to jump a greater distance.\nHold the Jump key after using to spend 20 MP to descent slowly for up to 5 sec.
primary.desc: Up jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump Key while in the air
After using, holding the Jump Key will allow you to slowly float down<bp_You can move while floating_>

primary.name: Magic Armor
primary.shortDesc: Defense: +90

primary.name: MP Boost
primary.shortDesc: Max MP: +20%, Attack Speed: +1, MP increases by 120 per level\nCritical Rate: +5% when equipped with a Wand

primary.name: Flame Orb
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22, Damage: 301%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Casts several fireballs forward

primary.name: Elemental Drain
primary.shortDesc: For each Damage-Over-Time effect active on nearby foes (up to 5): Final Damage: +3%. Total applied between Elemental Drains.

primary.name: Poison Breath
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 17, Damage: 180%, Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 6\nDamage Over Time: 60% damage every 1 sec for 10 se.
primary.desc: Casts an explosion poison cloud around you
details: Applies a damaging debuff to enemies hit

primary.name: Meditation
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Party Member Magic ATT: +30, Duration: 240 sec

primary.name: Agile Magic
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, INT: +20

primary.name: Ignite
primary.shortDesc: When casting Fire magic, 50% chance to create a wall of fire that lasts 6 sec. and attacks at a certain interval with the following effects: [Max Enemies Hit: 8. Damage: 40%, Attack Count: 3, Duration: 6 sec.]
primary.desc: While toggled, successfully striking an enemy with a Fire-Attribute attacks has a chance to create a damaging wall of fire
details: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/inferno-aura.png} tip={Inferno Aura (Hyper Skill)}> does not trigger Ignite

primary.name: Spell Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: 50%, Magic ATT: +10, Critical Rate: +5%

primary.name: High Wisdom
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase INT by 40

primary.name: MP Eater
primary.shortDesc: MP Absorb Chance: 20%, Amount Absorbed: 10% of Max MP\nAmount Absorbed: 5% of the boss's Max MP
primary.desc: Your attacks have a chance to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max HP

primary.name: Explosion
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 56, Damage: 405%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Casts an explosion around yourself

primary.name: Poison Mist
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55, Damage: 270%, Duration: 15 sec, Damage Over Time: 240% damage every 1 sec for 6 sec
primary.desc: Releases a lingering poisonous fog that applies a damaging poison debuff

primary.name: Creeping Toxin
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 54, Totem Duration: 60
Summons a totem that transforms the surrounding area into a toxic pool which deals 204% every 1 sec. for 10 sec. to enemies within that pool.
Creeping Toxin Explosion: MP Cost 60. Chain explosions initiated by Creeping Toxin Explosion do not consume MP. Toxin pools can be detonated for 1.5 sec after they appear, dealing 200% damage 4 times to up to 10 enemies. That explosion will detonate any other nearby toxic pools.
An enemy damaged by chain explosions, taking place within 0.4 sec. of one another, takes 50% less Final Damage from all explosions after the first.
Damage Against Normal Enemies: +50%
primary.desc: Summons a totem that spreads a toxic pool along a platform
details: Enemies within the pool will receive a damaging debuff
Using a Fire-Attribute attack will cause the pool to explode<bp_The explosion will detonate nearby pools_Enemies will take reduced %Final Damage for all explosions after the first_>

primary.name: Elemental Adaptation (Fire, Poison)
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 35, activates Elemental Adaptation.
Consumes 2% of Max MP for a 100% chance to block debilitating status conditions, and regenerate the barrier up to 10 times.
Cooldown: 240 sec.
[Passive Effect: Status and Elemental Resistances +20%]
primary.desc: Creates a barrier that blocks up to 10 Critical Abnormal Statuses
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance

primary.name: Teleport Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Additional MP Cost: 20, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Damage: 272%, Stun Chance: 80%, Stun Duration: 4 sec. For 20 sec., inflicts 98% damage at every 2 sec.\n[Passive Effect: Knockback Resistance: +40%]
primary.desc: While toggled, using <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/teleport.png} tip={Teleport (1st Job)}> will damage nearby enemies
details: Has a chance to stun enemies and apply a damaging debuff

primary.name: Teleport Boost
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Teleport Distance: Horizontal +65, Vertical +25.
primary.desc: While toggled, increases the teleport distance of <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/teleport.png} tip={Teleport (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Elemental Decrease
primary.shortDesc: Enemy Elemental Resistance: -10%, Final Damage +40%

primary.name: Element Amplification
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: +50%, Damage: +50%
details: Does not apply to <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/inferno-aura.png} tip={Inferno Aura (Hyper Skill)}>

primary.name: Arcane Overdrive
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +30%, Critical Damage: +13%

primary.name: Burning Magic
primary.shortDesc: Increases damage over time durations by 100%, increases final damage by 13% when attacking enemies affected by damage over time, stun, freeze, darkness, or paralysis effects.

primary.name: Flame Sweep
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Damage: 220%, Number of Attacks: 7, Max Enemies Hit: 8\nBurn Duration: 5 sec., Damage Over Time: 240% damage every 1 sec.
primary.desc: Casts a wall of flame in front of you
details: Applies a damaging debuff to enemies hit

primary.name: Mist Eruption
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 125%, Number of Attacks: 10, Number of Explosions: 2, Ignore Defense: +40%. Final Damage Modifier: +20% for 2 explosions, +45% for 3 explosions, +80% for 4 explosions, +125% for 5 explosions. Max Simultaneous Mist Explosions: 6. Cooldown: 10 sec\nMist Eruption's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds upon striking an enemy with 5 or more explosions. This cooldown reduction applies before other cooldown reductions.\n[Passive Effect] Permanently increases Poison Mist's continuous damage to 300%.
primary.desc: Causes nearby <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/poison-mist.png} tip={Poison Mist (3rd Job)}> to explode damaging nearby enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/poison-mist.png} tip={Poison Mist (3rd Job)}> DoT
The explosion gains increased %Final Damage based on how many DoT debuffs an enemy has active
If the explosion hits an enemy, the cooldown of <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/flame-haze.png} tip={Flame Haze (4th Job)}> is reset
Not affected by cooldown resets<bp_Cooldown is slightly reduced if an enemy hit has 5 or more DoT debuffs_>

primary.name: Fervent Drain
primary.shortDesc: Increases the Final Damage of each damage-over-time effect inflicted by your skills by 5%

primary.name: Meteor Shower
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 315%, Number of Attacks: 12, Cooldown: 45 sec\nPassive Effect: [Final Attack] Your attack skills have a 60% chance to strike a single enemy with a meteorite, dealing 220% damage.
primary.desc: Creates a shower of meteors that rain down from the sky
details: [Final Attack]: Your attacks have a chance for a meteor to strike a single enemy

primary.name: Flame Haze
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Damage on a Single Target: 202%, Number of Attacks: 15, inflicts 200% continuous damage at 100% chance for 10 sec. Maintains untouchable status and slows enemy by -50%. Upon hitting enemy, the Poison Mist forms on enemy location. If no enemy is hit, the Poison Mist forms on your location\nCooldown: 10 sec
primary.desc: Launches a fireball forward at a single enemy that applies a damaging burning debuff
details: Enemies with the debuff are slowed and cannot deal touch damage
<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/poison-mist.png} tip={Poison Mist (3rd Job)}> will form where an enemy was hit or around you if no enemy are struck

primary.name: Infinity
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 80, Duration: 40 sec. Periodically restores your base HP and MP by 10%.
Increases Final Damage by 70% during the buff. Periodically increases Final Damage by 3%, can increased up to 115%, Final Damage increased by Infinity is additive.
Mana swirls around the character when 30% remains of the final buff duration (accounting for the duration-enhancing effects).
Cooldown: 180 sec.
primary.desc: When active, your skills do not consume mana and you gain increased %Final Damage
details: Additionally while active, continuously increases %Final Damage (additively) and periodically restores %Max HP/MP
When the buff is close to expiring, a visual effect will appear around your character

primary.name: Ifrit
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 120, Ifrit Summon Duration: 260 sec.\nDamage: 150%, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Number of Attacks: 3, Damage Over Time: 140% damage every 1 sec. for 2 sec.\n[Passive Effect: Permanently increases Mastery by 70%]
primary.desc: Summon Ifrit that attacks nearby enemies that applies a damaging burn debuff

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Arcane Aim
primary.shortDesc: Ignores 20% of enemy DEF. Successful attacks have a 100% chance to increase your damage by 8% for 5 sec (excludes minion damage).\nThis effect stacks up to 5 times.
primary.desc: Successfully damaging an enemy grants a stacking %Damage buff (up to 5 times)
details: Summon attacks cannot trigger this effect

primary.name: Buff Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Permanently Increased Magic ATT: +30, Buff Duration: +50%, Knockback Resistance: +60%

hyperActive.name: Inferno Aura
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100 per second, Duration: 3 sec, Max enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 2\nAttacked enemies receive 500% damage every 1 sec. for 30 sec.
hyperActive.desc: When toggled, create an aura around you that damages nearby enemies
details: Applies a damaging debuff to enemies hit
Ignores Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: Megiddo Flame
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, Blue Flames: 3
Damage: 380%, Number of Attacks: 4. Blue flame splits after hitting the enemy, generating 1 additional flames. Up to 11 flames can be generated, including the original flame.
When multiple blue flame strikes a single enemy, Final Damage decreases by 55% for subsequent flames.
Enemies burned by the blue flame take 700% damage every 1 sec for 30 sec.
Cooldown: 50 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Launches several fireballs that seek out nearby enemies
details: Applies a damaging debuff when the fireball strikes an enemy
Upon damaging an enemy, the fireballs split creating up to a maximum of 11 flames, including the original flames
Enemies will take reduced %Final Damage for all fireballs after the first if multiple strike a single enemy
Fireballs will target boss monsters first prioritizing based on highest HP
Ignores Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Explorer class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: DoT Punisher
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, Flame Orbs Created: 15, Damage Per Orb: 850%, Number of Attacks: 5, Duration: 20 sec
Flame Orb Damage: 290% damage every 1 sec for 8 sec
Summons 1 additional orb for every 1 of your damage over time stack(s) on enemies in range. Up to 25 Flame Orbs can be summoned in total.
When multiple orbs hit a single target, their damage is reduced by 45%, starting with the second orb.
Cooldown: 25 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Releases multiple flame orbs that seek out enemies and applies a damaging burning debuff
details: Summons additional orbs for every DoT debuff on enemies in range<bp_Only up to a maximum of 25 Flame Orbs will be created_>
If multiple orbs hit a single target, their %Final Damage is reduced

fifthMain.name: Poison Nova
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, Creates a number of poisonous clouds that deal 550% damage 12 times, and inflict an additional 660% damage every 1 sec for 10 sec.
Enemies can only be struck by one poisonous cloud.
1 sec or more after poisonous clouds are created, you can use Mist Eruption to detonate them, hitting up to 12 enemies dealing 1485% damage 12 times. Explosion damage from poisonous clouds can apply up to 3 times for each enemy.
Cooldown: 25 sec
fifthMain.desc: Releases multiple poison orbs that spread out in all directions, poisoning any enemies it collides with
details: After several seconds, you can detonate the orbs to explode with <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/mist-eruption.png} tip={Mist Eruption (4th Job)}> dealing massive damage<bp_The orbs will change colors when they are ready to detonate_>

fifthMain.name: Elemental Fury
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Damage: 440%, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Number of Attacks: 6, Attack Duration: 3 sec\nDuration increases 0.6 sec per 1 active Fervent Drain\nCooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summon a spirit of fire to attack nearby enemies
details: Duration is increased for each stack of <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/elemental-drain.png} tip={Fervent Drain (4th Job)}>
Can only be used when <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/ifrit.png} tip={Ifrit (4th Job)}> is active

fifthMain.name: Poison Chain
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Enemies Hit: 2, Damage: 550%, Number of Attacks: 4, Poison Duration: 20 sec. Explosion from poisoned enemy attacks 5 times with 330% damage periodically, and spreads to 3 enemies nearby that aren't poisoned.
If there are no enemies nearby, this skill creates a poison crystal for 5 sec. The poison crystal spreads to 1 enemy nearby and disappears or naturally disappears, without spreading, when the duration ends.
Poison accumulates up to 5 times. Explosion damage increases 60% points each in proportion to the accumulated poison.
Explosion can occur up to 9 times on 1 enemy and up to 17 times on all enemies in total.
If the skill ended because the available explosions were used up, all poison is removed and followed by an additional explosion.
Cooldown: 25 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Cast a stacking poisonous debuff onto two enemies that spreads to nearby enemies
details: If no enemies nearby, a crystal is created that will infect the next enemy in range and disappears
Debuffed enemies will periodically create a poisonous explosion that spreads the debuff<bp_Debuff can stack up to 5 times, each time increases the %Damage of the poison explosion_>

Each enemy can only explode up to 9 times, and a total of 17 times across all affected enemies<bp_If you reach maximum explosions, when the skill ends, all enemies will explode for a final explosion_>
Does not trigger Damage Reflect or <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/elemental-drain.png} tip={Fervent Drain (4th Job)}>

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/flame-sweep.png} tip={Flame Sweep (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Flame Sweep
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 52, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 355%, Number of Attacks: 7
When Flame Sweep hits 2 times, the next Flame Sweep causes a giant flame.
Enemies hit by the giant flame have an ember for 30 sec, and an explosion dealing 375% damage 8 times occurs when they are hit by Mist Eruption
Enemies hit by all the flames of Flame Sweep are burned for 5 sec, and receive 435% continuous damage every 1 sec.

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/flame-haze.png} tip={Flame Haze (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/mist-eruption.png} tip={Mist Eruption (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Flame Haze
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 83, Damage: 335%, Number of Attacks: 15
100% chance to deal 325% continuous damage for 10 sec. Maintains untouchable status and slows enemy by -51%
Upon hitting an enemy, the Poison Mist forms on enemy location. If no enemy is hit, the Poison Mist forms on your location
Cooldown: 10 sec
[Passive Effect: Permanently increases the continuous damage of Poison Mist created by Flame Haze to 476%, but no Poison Mist used directly.]

masteryCore.name: HEXA Mist Eruption
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 115, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 215%, Number of Attacks: 10, Number of Explosions: 2
Ignore Defense: +45%. Final Damage Modifier: +20% for 2 explosions, +54% for 3 explosions, +104% for 4 explosions, +170% for 5 explosions
Max Simultaneous Mist Explosions: 6
Cooldown: 10 sec
Mist Eruption's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds upon striking an enemy with 5 or more damage-over-time effects. This cooldown reduction from stacking 4 damage-over-time effects applies before other cooldown reductions.

masteryCore.name: 3rd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/ignite.png} tip={Ignite (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/ifrit.png} tip={Ifrit (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/inferno-aura.png} tip={Inferno Aura (Hyper Skill)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Ignite
masteryCore.shortDesc: When casting Fire magic, 50% chance to create a wall of fire that lasts 4 sec. and attacks at a certain interval with the following effects:\n[Max Enemies Hit: 8. Damage: 75%, Attack Count: 3, Duration: 4 sec., Max Number of Attacks on a Single Enemy: 3]

masteryCore.name: HEXA Ifrit
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 143, Ifrit Summon Duration: 270 sec.\nDamage: 228%, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Number of Attacks: 3\nDamage Over Time: 215% damage every 1 sec. for 2 sec.

masteryCore.name: HEXA Inferno Aura
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 110 per second, Duration: 3 sec., Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 800%, Number of Attacks: 2.\nAttacked enemies receive 500% damage every 1 sec. for 30 sec.

masteryCore.name: 4th Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/teleport-mastery.png} tip={Teleport Mastery/Creeping Toxin (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/meteor-shower.png} tip={Meteor Shower (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/fire-poison/megiddo-flame.png} tip={Megiddo Flame (Hyper Skill)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Creeping Toxin
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 60, Totem Duration: 60
Summons a totem that transform the surrounding area into a toxic pool which deals 307% every 1 sec. for 10 sec. to enemies within that pool.
Creeping Toxin Explosion: MP Cost: 66. Chain explosions initiated by Creeping Toxin Explosion do not consume MP. Toxic pools can be detonated for 1.5 sec. after they appear, dealing 340% damage 4 times to up to 10 enemies. That explosion will detonate any other nearby toxic pools.
An enemy damaged by chain explosions, taking place within 0.4 sec. of one another, takes 60% less Final Damage from all explosions after the first.
Normal Enemy Damage: +50%

masteryCore.name: HEXA Meteor Shower
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 330, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 700%, Number of Attacks: 12\nCooldown: 50 sec.\nPassive Effect: [Final Attack Skill] Your attacks have a 65% chance to drop a meteorite, dealing 383% damage

masteryCore.name: HEXA Megiddo Flame
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 570, Blue Flames: 3
Damage: 660%, Number of Attacks: 5. Blue flame splits after hitting the enemy, generating 1 additional flames. Up to 11 flames can be generated, including the original flame.
When multiple blue flames strike a single enemy, Final Damage decreased by 55% for subsequent flames, Enemies burned by the blue flame take 980% damage every 1 sec. for 30 sec.
Explosion Mode: Flames do not generate and explode upon landing a hit.
Damage: 455%, Number of Attacks: 3, Number of Explosions: 3
Cooldown: 50 sec.

skillCore.name: Infernal Venom
skillCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1500, invincible during casting
Fervent Drain Limit Expansion: 10 stacks, Duration: 20 sec
The incarnation of fire and poison are liberated, Enemies Hit: 15, Explosion Damage: 540%, Number of Attacks: 8, Number of Explosions: 17
The magic of the two incarnations combine, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Explosion Damage: 530%, Number of Attacks: 12, Number of Powerful Explosion Magic: 42
Cooldown: 360 sec

skillCore.name: Immortal Flame
skillCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Invincible during casting\nA torrent of magic flames rains down 19 times, dealing 7105% damage to up to 15 enemies 9 times. Afterwards, the flames explodes 20 times, dealing 8505% damage 12 times.\nIgnore Defense: +60%, Boss Damage: +40%, Critical Rate: 100%

meta: Arch Mage (Fire, Poison) is an INT mage class part of the Explorers. Arch Mage (Fire, Poison) utilize both Staves and Wands as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Arch Mage (Fire, Poison) can equip Magic Books and Shields
